result.eng: I would like to apologize to you.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom leithscéal a ghabháil leat
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom leithscéal a ghabháil leat
result.html: Ba mhaith liom leithscéal a ghabháil leatI would like to apologize to you.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom leiṫscéal a ġaḃáil leatI would like to apologize to you.
